He is independent, consistent and hard working. He does his business in the town of "Batallas" (Battles) characterized by being situated on the shores of the sacred lake Titicaca. The residents of this area work in agriculture, fishing and livestock. The climate is cold and dry with a temperature ranging between 0 and 10 degrees Celsius during the day.

Esteban is of dark complexion, with short black hair and a robust physique. His mother tongue is Aymara, which is spoken in the area, and he speaks Spanish in the common tongue and in his business. He shares his life with his wife, who is engaged in the same business. They live in their home built of adobe, which has electricity, but no water or sewage system because there is still no service in this area.

His business is the making of shoes for cholitas; a cholita is a traditionally dressed Bolivian woman (wearing a hat, blanket, and skirt) and their shoes are characterized by being short and without heels, although the models vary according to the season and fashion. "The way to dress as a "cholita paceña" (a traditionally dressed Bolivian woman, specifically from La Paz) has changed with the years. Now they demand new materials and models from me ... " he says.

The advantage of his business is that his workshop is at home, the downside is his lack of machinery to work. His dream is to sell [his products] wholesale in the city; he wants to buy an industrial sewing machine. This is his first sequence of loans with the institution in the 15 years that he has been performing this activity.

It is for these reasons that Esteban is applying for a loan to buy an industrial sewing machine for the making of traditional womens' shoes .

loans.use: to purchase an industrial sewing machine for making traditional women's shoes.

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita works hard to support her family. Perlita is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Perlita requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Perlita has been in this business for 20 years now.

Perlita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Teodorica

texts.en:
Teodorica is a married woman with nine children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Teodorica is 51 years old, and two of her children are still in school.

Teodorica has a native bags making business in the Philippines. Teodorica requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more materials for her business.

Teodorica has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Teodorica would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her business

loans.name: Sani

texts.en:
Sani is maize farmer from Tashar Ice village. As a member of Babban Gona, Sani is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer. With Babban Gona’s support, he has the chance to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria.

Before joining Babban Gona, Sani would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs for food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Sani can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Sani is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family, and in the end, hopes to use his increased earnings to ensure that all his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ma. Cristina

texts.en:
Ma. Cristina is 31 years old and married with three children.

Ma. Cristina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like canned goods, coffee, cereals, milk, soft drinks, candies, shampoo, etc., to sell.

Ma. Cristina has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from raising pigs and farming vegetables.

Ma. Cristina aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, coffee, cereals, milk, soft drinks, candies, shampoo, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Melvin Alexander

texts.es: La vivienda en la que vive Melvin es muy humilde pero cuenta con un gran corredor, en el cual el cuida de sus cerdos, caballos, entre otros animales de granja, lo que le permite sacar adelante a su familia. Él tiene 23 años de edad y vive con su grupo familiar, desde hace muchos años en vivienda propia. Melvin desea invertir en más cerdos los productos necesarios para su crianza, ya que desea contar con suficiente producto en temporada navideña. Por lo anterior él solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cerdos, concentrado y vitaminas para la crianza de cerdos en su vivienda.
texts.en: The home where Melvin lives is very humble, but has a large hall, in which he takes care of his pigs and horses, among other farm animals; which allows him to support his family.  He is 23 years old and lives with his family; they've had their own home for many years now.  Melvin wants to invest in more pigs and the necessary products for their breeding, because he wants to have enough product at Christmastime.  Therefore he is requesting a loan with FUSAI to invest in: pigs, concentrated feed, and vitamins for raising pigs in his home.

loans.use: to invest in: pigs, concentrated feed, and vitamins for raising pigs in his home.

loans.name: Linda Vivian

texts.es:
Linda es una mujer de 30 años de edad, es soltera con un hijo de 4 años, ellos viven en una comunidad denominada barrio la Unión.
Para que a su familia no le falte nada, Linda trabaja como enfermera desde hace varios años, ella trabaja en ocasiones todas las noches o todo el día dependiendo de su turno. Pero es su tiempo libre se dedica a su pequeña librería que es de donde proviene un poco más de ingresos. A Linda le preocupa las condiciones en las que su casa se encuentra  aunque se ha esforzado mucho para realizar la remodelación no le ha sido posible  por esa razón acude a un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para empezar la remodelación de su casa.
Su gran sueño es terminar la remodelación de su casa para que su familia tenga una casa más digna.
texts.en:
Linda is a 30 year old woman. She is single with a 4-year-old son. They live in the community called quarter "la Unión".
Linda is working as a nurse for several years, to make sure that her family has everything it needs.
At times she is working every night or the whole day depending on her turns. But in her free time she minds her little bookstore from which she derives some more income.

Linda is concerned about the conditions of her house. Although she tried hard to carry out the renovation, it wasn´t possible for her. For this reason she turns to a loan for the purchase of construction material to begin with the renovation of her house.
Her great dream is to finish the renovation of her house so that her family will have a more dignified home.

loans.use: to buy material for the renovation of her house

loans.name: Dúo Bello Atardecer Group

texts.es: Dúo Bello Atardecer: es grupo esta conformado por la señora Lucia de 35 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tipica desde hace varios años, gracias al apoyo de su familia a podido salir adelante con su negocio, en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa para vender, ya que se acerca la época navideña y quiere aprovechar para vender y aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: “Dúo Bello Atardecer” (Duo of the Beautiful Sunset): is a group that includes Señora Lucia, a 35 year old woman.  She has made her living selling traditional clothing for several years now.  Thanks to the support of her family she has been able to get ahead with her business.  On this occasion she is requesting this loan to buy clothes to resell, as Christmastime is approaching and she wants to make the most of this time to sell and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy new clothes to resell.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is 37 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Nelia has been raising livestock for 8 years and also earns additional income from farming vegetables.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Ailein

texts.en:
Ailein is a 31-year-old married woman with three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Ailein has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more variety of fish to sell. She has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future, Ailein would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more variety of fish to sell

loans.name: Digna Concepcion

texts.es:
Digna, de 47 años de edad, está acompañada, es madre de 3 hijos, de 13, 11 y 15 años de edad.

Digna, se dedica a la comercialización de frutas y verduras en el mercado municipal, el cual fue un regalo de su madre para que ella trabajará y pudiera generar ingresos para su familia. 

Digan, necesita el préstamo para comprar verduras y frutas para vender, porque con la temporada de fin de año vende más. 

Digna, sueña con que su negocio crezca y a través de eso pueda mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Digna is 47 years old. She is in a relationship and is the mother of 3 children: ages 13, 11, and 15 years old.

Digna is engaged in the marketing of fruits and vegetables in [a stand in] the town market, which was a gift from her mother so that Digna could work and generate income for her family.

Digna needs a loan to buy vegetables and fruits to resell, because in the year-end season she sells more.

Digna dreams that her business will grow, and that through it she will be able to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits to resell.

loans.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es: Rosa tiene 3 años de experiencia en la venta de productos de belleza, lo que le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus hijos con mucho esfuerzo. Ella a sus 38 años de edad tiene dos hijas de 20 y 17 años de edad con las que vive al lado también de su compañero de vida en vivienda propia desde hace 7 años. Rosa desea invertir en mayor cantidad de productos de belleza para tener suficiente producto para la época navideña, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: maquillaje, polvos, sombra para ojos, labiales, cremas, lociones, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Rosa has 3 years of experience in selling beauty products, which with great effort has allowed her to provide for her children. She is 38 years old and has two daughters, ages 20 and 17, who are living with her along with her life partner, in their own home for 7 years now.  Rosa wants to invest in a big quantity of beauty products in order to have enough product for the Christmas season.  Therefore she is requesting a loan with FUSAI to buy: makeup, powder, eye shadow, lipstick, creams, lotions, and other products.

loans.use: to buy: makeup, powder, eye shadow, lipstick, creams, lotions, and other products.

loans.name: Felicisima

texts.en:
Felicisima works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Felicisima would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Leoncia

texts.en:
Leoncia is 56 years old and single.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as bath soap, detergent, canned goods, coffee, sugar, salt, cooking oil, etc.

In the future, Leoncia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Lorlin

texts.en:
Lorlin is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers for her fish vending business. She has been in this business for 8 years and earns more income from food vending.

Lorlin has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 48 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like cassava, banana, sugar, cooking oil, etc. for her food vending business. She has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future, Angelina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like cassava, banana, sugar, cooking oil, etc. for her food vending business

loans.name: Bendy

texts.en:
Bendy is 35 years old and married, and she has one child who is in school.

Bendy is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has been raising livestock for 11 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Bendy would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is a 38-year-old married woman with three children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Marietta has a food vending business in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like coconut, flour, eggs, milk, etc. for her business. She has been in this business for 6 years.

In the future, Marietta would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like coconut, flour, eggs, milk, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 46 years old and married with four children. With three children currently in school, Wilma works very hard to provide for them.

Wilma runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, shampoo, biscuits, canned goods, candies, etc.

In the future, Wilma would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Agée de 37 ans, Safiatou est une jeune femme marié et mère de 3 enfants.Son marie est un éleveur ; ils vivent au Mali en milieu rural,c'est la femme qui tient la corne du bélier sur la photo .
Alphabétisé, elle s’investit dans l’élevage auprès de son mari depuis leur mariage il y a douze ans.
Elle s’approvisionne dans sa zone et y revend ses animaux ; la veille des fêtes musulmans est la période favorite pour écouler plus d’animaux à prix d’Or.
Le prêt que Fatoumata a eu au RMCR sera intégralement investi dans l’achat des moutons.
Elle fait recours à l’institution pour pouvoir préparer un avenir meilleur pour ses enfants.
En plus de l’argent qu’elle gagne dans la commercialisation de ses animaux, elle trouve du lait pour ses enfants et de l’engrais organique pour les champs ; véritables source de motivation pour fatoumata.
Son activité génère une sommes de 30.000fcfa par mois ; cette sommes l’aide à soutenir son mari dans la prises en charge des dépenses quotidiennes de la famille (éducation, santé, nourriture et habillement).
texts.en:
Safiatou is thirty-seven years old, married and mother to three children. Her husband works as a livestock farmer and they live in a rural area of Mali. She is seen in the photo holding the goat's horn. Safiatou is educated and has worked in farming with her husband since their marriage twelve years ago. She buys and sells her animals locally. The eve of muslim festivals is the best time to make the greatest profit.

This loan will be used to buy more sheep. Safiatou would like to be able to offer a better future to her children. As well as selling the sheep and goats, Safiatou uses them to provide milk and organic fertilizer for the fields.

Her business generates 30,000 francs CFA per month and Safiatou uses this to help her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family (education, healthcare, food and clothing).

loans.use: to rear sheep for eight months.

loans.name: Wend Songre Group

texts.fr: Zourata,est une femme âgée 39 ans mariée mère de 3 enfants. Zourata exerce son activité depuis 20 ans de sandwich et de condiment.Ce qui fait marcher son activité c'est son dynamisme, son courage, sa bonne relation envers ses clients, elle tient son lieu de commerce très propre.Elle veut le prêt pour l'huile à 13 000 f, mayonnaise 15 000 f, du charbon à 6 000, des œufs à  9 400 f, du maïs à 15 000 f et le reste des 91 600 f pour l'achat des condiments. L'utilité du prêt c'est de réapprovisionner en marchandises afin de renforcer son activité. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt une fois et à rembourser à la bonne date à ACFIME.
texts.en:
Zourata is thirty-nine years old, married and mother to three children. She has been making sandwiches and other food for twenty years now. She is successful in her business because she is dynamic, courageous, keeps her business premises clean and has a good relationship with her clients.

Zourata will use her loan to buy oil (13,000 francs CFA), mayonnaise (15,000 francs CFA), charcoal (6,000 francs CFA), eggs (9,400 francs CFA), maize (15,000 francs CFA) and other food ingredients (91,600 francs CFA). This will reinforce her stock levels and strengthen her business.

Zourata has already had a loan with the field partner, ACFIME, and it was fully and correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy oil, mayonnaise, charcoal, eggs, maize and other food ingredients.

loans.name: Zoen

texts.en:
Zoen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years, and earns more income from electronic mobile load retailing.

Zoen is borrowing 6,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business, such as sugar, cooking oil, bananas, flour, etc. Until now, Zoen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as sugar, cooking oil, bananas, flour, etc. for her food production business.

loans.name: Salina

texts.en:
Nearly all the people in the Kitale area are farmers, and Salina is one of them. Salina is a mixed farmer based in a remote village in the Kitale area of Kenya. She is a proud mother of four lovely, school-going children, whom she truly loves and greatly adores. Salina describes her upbringing as challenging, so she is doing everything in her power to provide a good foundation for her children and to help secure their future. 

Salina is seeking a loan to purchase farm inputs. With the 30,000 KES loan, she is going to pay for a truckload of manure and also pay for seedlings. 

Salina has been farming for nearly a decade. She will use the loan investment and the years of experience she has gathered to make this expansion a success. Money gathered from this investment will enable Salina to contribute to her family's general expenses, her children's education, and medical needs.

Be inspired and make a loan!

loans.use: to buy manure and seedlings for her farm.

loans.name: Janessa

texts.en:
Janessa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig raising business in the Philippines. Janessa has been in this business for five years now.

She has requested an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs. Janessa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Rodolphe

texts.fr:
Rodolphe est un père de famille de 40 ans. Il a 4 enfants âgés de 10 à 14 ans et ils sont tous scolarisés actuellement.
Rodolphe est dans la vente de téléphone et accessoire depuis 2009. Il est à son 4eme prêt. Les prêts antérieurs lui ont permis d’augmenter le stock et de diversifier les produits. Le prêt servira à l’achat de téléphones et accessoires téléphoniques : téléphones tactiles et monobloc, écouteurs, chargeurs, cartes mémoire… 
Il a pour objectif  de pouvoir octroyer des fonds à  sa femme pour l’ouverture d’un point de vente car celle-ci n'a pas encore de travail stable pour le moment, le but étant la réussite de leurs  enfants dans leurs études .
texts.en:
Rodolphe is forty years old and a family man. He has four children aged from ten to fourteen years old and they all attend school. He has been selling phones and accessories since 2009.

This will be his fourth loan. The previous loans helped to increase his stock levels and expand the range of products he offers. This loan will pay for telephones and accessories (tactile phones, one-piece phones, headphones, chargers and memory cards). Rodolphe's aim is to provide money for his wife to open a shop as she doesn't have any fixed work at the moment. Ultimately, they are both working for the education of their children.

loans.use: to buy portable phones (tactile and one-piece) and phone accessories.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is a 36-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Geraldine has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more varieties of fish to sell to her customers.

Geraldine has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more varieties of fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Razafindrakoto

texts.fr:
Fetranarindra est un très jeune homme dynamique. Il habite à la campagneavec sa femme et son enfant. Pour gagner sa vie, il élève des poules pondeuses et cela depuis 2 ans.

Il est emprunteur chez Vahatra depuis 2 ans. Les bénéfices des prêts précédents lui ont permis d’augmenter le nombre de poules. Ce prêt va lui permettre d’acheter une couveuse, de la farine alimentaire et des vitamines.

Son objectif est de chercher de nouveaux clients afin de gagner beaucoup de bénéfice et d’arriver à l’autonomie.
texts.en:
Fetra Narindra is a very dynamic young man. He lives in the countryside with his wife and child. To make a living, he raises laying hens and has done this for 2 years.

He has been a borrower at Vahatra for 2 years. Profits from his preceding loans  have allowed him to increase the number of hens. This loan allows him afford an incubator, food, flour, and vitamins.

His objective is to seek new customers to increase earnings and reach autonomy.

loans.use: to buy an incubator and feed to rear egg-laying chickens.

loans.name: Hanitra

texts.fr:
Hanitra est une femme de 40 ans qui est mariée et élève 2 enfants. Pour pouvoir à la fois s’occuper des enfants et gagner de l’argent pour vivre, elle a choisit l’élevage porcin comme activité. 
Cela fait maintenant 3 ans qu’elle élève des porcs. Elle dit que c’est une activité qui rapporte beaucoup de bénéfices si elle les nourrit bien et effectue les vaccins à temps. Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 3 porcs et 720 Kg de provendes. 
Le rêve de Hanitra est d’acheter un terrain et de construire une maison en dure pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Hanitra is a 40 year old married woman raising two children. In order to be able to look after the children and earn an income at the same time, she has chosen pig rearing as a business. She has been doing this for three years.
She says that this is a highly profitable business, if she feeds the pigs well and gives them timely vaccinations.
With this loan, she plans to buy three pigs and 720 kgs of feed. Hanitra's dream is to buy a building plot, and to build a solid house for her family.

loans.use: to buy three pigs and 720 kgs of feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
of As a married parent of two children, Fe works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending. Fe is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready to wear to sell.

Fe has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready to wear to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.fr:
Joséphine est une femme talentueuse âgée de 47 ans et qui vit avec son mari et ses 4 enfants. Elle tailleur et vend ses œuvres dans son atelier à son domicile. 
Cela fait maintenant 1 an qu’elle est emprunteuse chez Vahatra. Elle a pu étendre son activité grâce aux prêts précédents. Avec ce prêt, Joséphine pense acheter une machine à coudre et des tissus afin d’augmenter les vêtements à vendre. 
Elle espère gagner beaucoup de bénéfices afin d’en épargner pour l’achat d’un terrain et la construction d’une maison pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Joséphine is a talented 47 year old who lives with her husband and four children. She makes and sells her articles from her workshop in her home.
She has been a borrower of Vahatra for one year, and has been able to grow her business thanks to previous loans. With this loan, Joséphine is intending to buy a sewing machine and some fabric in order to make more clothing to sell.
She hopes to earn significant profit, to allow her to save towards buying a building plot and constructing a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy a professional sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Soraida

texts.en:
Soraida is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food vending business.

Soraida has been in this business for 10 years. Soraida earns more income from raising pigs.

Soraida has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, and spices for her food production business.

loans.name: Mamisoa Lalaina

texts.fr:
Mamisoa Lalaina a 39ans, elle est mariée et travaille avec son mari. Ils ont 4 enfants de 16ans, 14ans, 12ans et un de 2ans, ce dernier seulement n’étant pas encore scolarisé.
Elle est marchande de différents articles électroniques et autres comme machines à calculer, radios, micros etc. Elle a effectué  cette activité depuis 1999. Avant elle travaillait dans une entreprise en zone franche, mais elle a trouvé ce travail fatigant et a décidé de s'intégrer dans le petit commerce avec sa mère. 
Le prêt sert à acheter divers articles de musique : radio à entrée carte mémoire, micros, carte mémoire, casques à entrée carte mémoire.
Elle est ingénieuse et curieuse. Le couple est très soudé. Ils ont pour objectif d’agrandir  leur maison et le  lieu de vente.
texts.en:
Mamisoa Lalaina is 39 and married; she works with her husband. They have four children - aged 16, 14, 12 and 2 - just the youngest is not yet in school. Since 1999 she has sold various electronic articles such as calculators, radios, microphones etc.
Previously she worked in the free zone, but found that work tiring - she decided to become a small trader with her mother.
The loan will be used to buy various music related items - radios with memory card slots, microphones, memory cards and headphones with memory card slots. She is innovative and interested in her business.
The couple get along very well together. Their goal is to extend their home and sales space.

loans.use: to buy radios, microphones, memory cards, headphones, calculators etc.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 38 years old and has two children. She is married and both of her children are in school.

Eva is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Eva requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Eva has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Eva would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Andresa

texts.en:
Andresa is an owner of a general store. She is 48 years old and a married woman. She lives in Dimiao, Bohol. Andresa runs a general store business that serves the needs of her community by providing day to day items. Andresa has also invested in rice farming for supplementary income.

Andresa is requesting a loan to grow her business so that she can increase the size of her general store and serve more customers. She applied for a loan to buy tooth paste, shampoo, insect repellent, canned sardines, seasoning, detergent powder, soy sauce, vinegar and bath soap.

This loan will allow her to expand her store and with it she can anticipate better sales for a profit. She is determined to make her business grow for her future and that of her husband when they are older.

loans.use: to buy tooth paste, shampoo, insect repellent, canned sardines, seasoning, detergent powder, soy sauce, vinegar and bath soap

loans.name: Haruna

texts.en:
Haruna is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Haruna has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Haruna would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Haruna can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Haruna will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land. Haruna is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Haingotiana Malala

texts.fr:
Haingotiana a 27ans. Elle est une femme débrouillarde et travailleuse. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur et a 2 enfants de 7ans et 3ans dont tous scolarisés. Elle dirige un magasin général et l’activité a débuté en 2014. Avant cette année, elle tenait une gargote après avoir abandonné ses études. Elle en est déjà à son 5eme prêt chez CEFOR dans le but de développer étendre le commerce.  Elle voudrait devenir grossiste un jour. Le prêt sert à ravitailler le magasin général: riz, haricot, maïs, pois de cap, huile et des boissons hygiénique, etc…
Elle est débrouillarde et a pour objectif de pouvoir construire une maison.
texts.en:
Haingotiana is 27. She is a hard working, no-nonsense woman. She is married and has two children - aged 7 and 3 - both are in school. She runs a general store which opened in 2014. Before this year, she ran a tavern after abandoning her studies.
This is already her fifth loan from CEFOR, helping her to develop and grow the business. One day she would like to become a wholesaler.
The loan will be used to restock the shop - rice, beans, corn, Cape peas, oil and soft drinks etc....

She is resourceful and her goal is to be able to build a house.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, corn, dried beans, dried cape peas and sugar, cans of edible oils and packs of soft drinks.

loans.name: Myrla

texts.en:
Myrla owns a "carenderia" or an eatery and a coffee shop as well. She prepares home meals such as fish soup, fried chicken, stewed vegetables and pork menus to locals in her place. When early or morning comes, she also sells hot drinks like coffee or any kind of beverages to the early commuters . She is married and has six grown children. She resides in the town of Dumanjug, Cebu. She has been running an eatery for many years now.


She would like to improve the content of merchandise in her shop to attract more customers and be able to cope with the high demands for basic necessities, which is food nowadays.

Mryla decided to join CEVI to access loans and boost her business. She wants to purchase stock like soft drinks, rice, meat. spices and beverages. These are vital tools that will provide ways of progressing.

She hopes that someday, she will become more productive as she continues to handle her livelihood for the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to purchase stock like soft drinks, rice, meat. spices and beverages.

loans.name: Herisoa Angeline

texts.fr:
Herisoa a 45ans, elle est mariée. Elle confectionne elle-même les articles, son mari assure la vente . Le couple travaille  ensemble et s’entraide. Le couple a 3 enfants scolarisés de 19ans, 17ans et 14ans.
Elle est à son 2eme prêt chez CEFOR. Elle est couturière et vendeuse de vêtements depuis 1998. Avant elle achetait ses articles à crédit. Elle a hérité du local de vente de sa famille. Elle a toujours déployé ses efforts dans la recherche de points de vente fixe. Son mari l’aide dans la vente des produits.
Grâce à ses efforts, elle a pu générer ses propres fonds en 2001. Le couple a pour objectif d’agrandir leur maison afin de pouvoir la mettre en location , à cet objectif s’ajoute la réussite de leurs enfants dans leurs études.
texts.en:
Herisoa is 45 years old and married. She makes the merchandise herself, and her husband handles the sales. The couple work together and help one another. They have three children, in education, aged 19, 17 and 14.
This is Herisoa's second loan from CEFOR. She has been a seamstress and clothing seller since 1998. Previously she bought her stock on credit. She inherited the showroom from her family, and has always made an effort to locate permanent sales outlets. Her husband helps her with the sale of the items.
Thanks to her efforts, she has been able to build her own financial capital in 2001. The couple intend to build an extension on their home, in order to be able to rent it out - and they also want to see their children succeed in their studies.

loans.use: to purchase various fabrics.

loans.name: Ana Angelica

texts.es: Ana es una mujer trabajadora que cuenta con una pequeña fábrica de curtidos en su vivienda, desde hace 10 años, por lo que se siente muy feliz de contar con este negocio, con el que ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos de 20, 17 y 16 años de edad, los que se encuentran estudiando, ya que ella a pesar de ser madre soltera desea que tengan lo mejor. Ana desea invertir en más materia prima para cumplir con la demanda de productos que le son solicitados, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en materia prima para el curtido y materiales para empacarlos y poder distribuirlos.
texts.en: Ana is a hard-working woman who has a small pickling factory in her home for the past 10 years. She feels very happy to have this business with which she has managed to support her three children, ages 16, 17, and 20. They are in school and although she is a single mother, she wants them to have the best. Ana wants to invest in more raw materials to meet the demand of the products that are asked for, so she is asking for a loan through FUSAI to invest in raw materials for pickling, and materials to package and be able to distribute them.

loans.use: to invest in raw materials for pickling, and materials to package and be able to distribute them.

loans.name: Marcelo Santos

texts.es: Las flores de nardo es el producto que cultiva Marcelo, lo cual le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia desde hace 14 años, por lo que se siente muy feliz por contar con este negocio. Él vive junto a su hijo de 24 años de edad al que ha logrado sacar adelante con mucho esfuerzo, ya que para llevar el sustento el lleva sus flores a la capital para venderlas. Marcelo desea comprar abono y follaje para su cultivo de flores y de esta manera cultivar más y obtener mejores ingresos económicos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: abono, follaje, entre otros para mejorar su producción y ganancias.
texts.en: Tuberose flowers are the products that Marcelo grows. This has allowed him to support his family for 14 years. He feels very happy to have this business. He lives with his 24-year old son who he has supported with a lot of effort, because he takes his flowers to the capital to sell them in order to put food on the table. Marcelo wants to buy fertilizer and foliage for his growing flowers and this way he can grow more and get a better income. So, he is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy fertilizer, foliage and other things to improve his production and earnings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, foliage and other things to improve his production and earnings.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy merchandise, steel jewelry and clothing, as well as raw materials to make women's clothing.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una joven de apenas 29 años de edad, es soltera vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en una comunidad denominada Caserío Pajoca.
Julia es una muchacha que aunque aún no cuente con familia propia busca la manera de superase, ella se dedica a la producción de banano, ella lleva 10 años de realizar esta actividad pues es a lo que se dedica toda su familia y porque en el lugar donde ella vive es una zona muy fértil.
Julia con los deseos de superación la aun instado a solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una cuerda de terreno para cultivo, esto con el fin de incrementar su cultivo y mejorar sus ingresos. Su mayor deseo es mejorar los ingresos económicos de su familia.
texts.en: Julia is a young woman, barely 29-years old. She is single and lives with her parents and siblings in the community called Caserío Pajoca. Julia is a girl who, although she does not have her own family, looks for a way to exceed. She works in banana production and has been doing this job for 10 years because all of her family does this job and because the area where she lives is very fertile. With the hopes of exceeding, Julia has decided to ask for a loan to buy an acre of land for cultivation in order to increase her crop and improve her income. Her main dream is to improve the income of her family.

loans.use: to buy an acre of land for cultivation.

loans.name: Blanca Leticia

texts.es:
Blanca, de 21 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su madre, sus hermanos y su hijo de 1 año de edad. 

Blanca, tiene un negocio de venta de celulares y otros accesorios electrónicos desde hace cuatro años y gracias a su pequeño negocio ha podido salir adelante con su hijo y su familia porque también ayuda con los gastos de su casa. 

Blanca, necesita el préstamo para comprar celulares, cargadores, audífonos, memorias USB, entre otros aparatos electrónicos para vender y así surtir su negocio y aprovechar la temporada navideña. 

Los sueños de Blanca, son poder progresar y salir adelante con su negocio y ver crecer a su hijo con mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Blanca, 21, is a single mother. She lives with her mother, her siblings, and her year-old child.

Blanca has had a business selling cell phones and other electronic accessories for four years. Thanks to her small business she has been able to get ahead with her son and her family, because she also helps with her household expenses.

Blanca needs the loan to buy cell phones, earphones, USB flash drives, and other electronics to sell. That way she can stock her business and make the most of the Christmas season.

Blanca's dreams are to be able to make progress and get ahead with her business and to see her son grow up with better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy cell phones, chargers, earphones, and other electronics to sell.

loans.name: Yimy

texts.es:
El socio Yimy continua trabajando como  mototaxista,el socio aporta en su hogar los gastos familiares. Su deseo de salir adelante hace que a diario salga temprano de casa y llega tarde después de laborar en su mototaxi.

El socio solicito el préstamo para comprar gasolina y repuestos para mototaxi.
El socio está contento y agradecido  por lo tanto se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Yimy, still works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He helps his household with the family expenses. His desire to get ahead makes him go out early every day and come home late after working on his motorcycle taxi.

The member requested the loan to buy gasoline and motorcycle taxi parts.

Yimy's happy and grateful, and he promises to make his payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and motorcycle taxi parts

loans.name: Helen Patricia

texts.es:
Helen, de 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos y su esposo trabaja como empleado en una empresa de vigilancia. 

Helen, es ama de casa y se dedica al cuidado de su casa y de los niños, pero también le gusta ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y es por eso que ella tiene su propio negocio en donde vende productos de primera necesidad.   

Helen, necesitad el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, bebidas, golosinas, entre otros productos para su tienda. 

Helen, desea ayudar a su esposo, para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Helen, 42 years old, is married, has two children and her husband works as a clerk in a security firm.

Helen is a homemaker and is dedicated to the care of her home and children, but she also likes to help her husband cover household expenses and that is why she has her own business selling basic consumer goods.

Helen needs the loan to buy rice, sugar, beverages, candy and other products for her store.

Helen wants to help her husband, so that they can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beverages, candy and other products for her store.

loans.name: Celinda

texts.es:
La socia sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “YANAHUARA SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”.
La socia Celinda continúa   dedicándose al negocio de venta de comida, en específico los tradicionales anticuchos, con este pequeño negocio sale adelante y además se gano el cariño de sus clientes por la sazón que tiene sus productos.
La socia solicito el préstamo para comprar carne, pollo y salchichas.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is still part of the communal bank Yanahuara Señor de Torrechayoc.

Celinda still has her business selling food, in particular anticuchos. With this little business she is able to get ahead and earns the affection of her customers as her food is so tasty.

She is requesting the loan to buy meat, chicken and sausages.

She is happy with the loan, and promises to comply with the agreed repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken and sausages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy steel jewelry, necklaces, chains, and bracelets.

loans.name: Manuel De J.

texts.es:
Manuel es un padre de familia muy trabajador y luchador, todos los días busca superarse para que no les falte nada, él cuenta que con su préstamo le fue bastante bien, pues la inversión en su negocio pudo realizar y sus ganancias mejoraron él está muy agradecido con los inversionistas de Kiva. A Manuel nuevamente se le presenta una oportunidad que él se ha propuesto no desaprovechar que es la compra de una cuerda de terreno para cultivo, a raíz de esta necesidad solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder adquirir este terreno y tener donde cultivar.
Su gran sueño es construir su propia casa para que su familia viva mejor.
texts.en:
Manuel's a very hardworking and persevering father. Every day he looks for a way to improve himself so his family has everything they need.

He says his loan went pretty well for him. His earnings improved with the investment he made in his business. He's very grateful to the Kiva lenders.

Manuel has another opportunity he wants to make the most of: the purchase of a cord of land for farming. This need leads him to request another loan so he can acquire this land and have a place to farm.

His big dream is to build his own house so his family can live better.

loans.use: to buy a cord of land for farming

loans.name: Ricardo Hernan

texts.es:
El Sr.Ricardo tiene 33 años de edad vive con sus 2 hijos  y conviviente en la Provincia de los Rios en el Canton Ventanas.

Trabaja en la Agricultura se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de Maiz manifiesta que el credito que adquirio va invertir en la compra de Insumos.

Piensa en su futuro en superar mas, y los tiempos libres de dedica a realizar deportes.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 33, lives with her two children and her partner in Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

He works in agriculture growing and harvesting corn. He says he's going to invest his loan in buying inputs.

He plans to improve more in the future. In his free time he plays sports.

loans.use: to buy inputs

loans.name: Washington Estuardo

texts.es:
El Sr. Washington tiene 25 años de edad es soltero  vive y tarabaja en la provincia de los Rios Canton Ventanas

Trabaja en la agricultura en la siembra y cosecha de maiz.

a su futura piensa en seguir trabajando los tirmpos libres se dedica a ver la television.
texts.en: Washington is 25 years old. He is single and lives and works in the Los Ríos Province of the Ventanas Canton. He works in agriculture, in the planting and harvesting of corn. In his future, he plans to continue working. In his free time, he watches television.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto, se ha decidido por solicitar un nuevo crédito por la necesidad de continuar sus labores agrícolas, podrá pagar obreros para limpiar o eliminar la maleza de una maicillera y de la milpa, esto permitirá que sus cultivos se desarrollen de una manera adecuada, así tendrá cosechas más abundantes e ingresos mayores.
Con el crédito anterior don Edilberto pudo sembrar granos básicos, en la actualidad manifiesta que ha tenido problemas económicos, pero con esfuerzos y el deseo de cumplir con sus responsabilidades a logrado salir adelante, su grupo familiar se mantiene
texts.en:
Edilberto has decided to apply for a new loan due to the need to continue farming. He will be able to pay workers for cleaning or weeding the corn- and sorghum fields and this will allow crops to develop in a proper way and will yield more abundant harvests and higher revenues.
With the previous loan, Don Edilberto was able to plant basic grains. Currently he states that he has had financial problems, but with his efforts and his desire to fulfil his responsibilities to get ahead, his family is coping.

loans.use: to pay workers for cleaning or weeding the corn- and sorghum fields. This will allow crops to develop in a proper way.

loans.name: Alda

texts.pt:
A senhora Alda de 42 anos de idade, casada e mãe de 06 filhos dos quais 04 frequentam a escola, um é menor de idade escolar e um já trabalha. Para além dos filhos, sustenta a sogra e 02 sobrinhos. Vende pão e o marido trabalha numa fabrica de cimento. Está a construir a sua casa em fases e com o empréstimo vai comprar cimento, varoes, pedras, area  para dar continuidade da sua obra.
Sonha concluir a sua casa para acomdar a familiar e ajudar o filho mais velho na construçao da sua casa, pois é maior de idade.
O desafio é lutar para alcançar os seus sonhos.
texts.en:
Alda is 42 years old. She is married with 6 children, 4 of them in school, one of them is too young to attend and one of them is working. Besides, her children, she supports a sister-in-law and 2 nephews. She sells bread and her husband works at a cement factory. She is building her home in stages and she will use this loan to buy cement, rods, stone, sand, to continue the works.
She dreams with finishing her home and move her family in and help her oldest son to build his home, as he is already for age.
Her goal is to fight and reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods, stone, sand, to continue building her home.

loans.name: Gulru

texts.ru: Гулру 37 летняя учительница города Вахдат. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Детям 9, 5 и 2 года. Ее муж занимается животноводством. Он занят с выращиванием скота. Гулру родилась и выросла в семье рабочих. Ее родители были учителем. По этой причине Гулру идет по стопам родителей. Она и ее муж хорошо воспитывает своих детей. Гулру 19 лет работает учительницей в средней школе. Она после школы у себя на земле занимается растениеводством. Ей в работе помогает ее заботливый муж. Гулру хочет отремонтировать дом и улучшить жилищные условия жизни семьи. У Углру не хватает денежных средств для ремонта. Она за счет кредита купить стройматериалы. Гулру надеется на Вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulru is a 37 year old teacher in Vahdat. She is married with three children, aged 9, 5 and 2. Her husband raises cattle. Gulru was born and raised in a family of workers. Her parents were also teachers, and Gulru is following in their footsteps. She and her husband are raising their children well. Gulru has been working as a secondary school teacher for 19 years. After school she works at home on the farm growing vegetables. Her caring husband helps her with the work. Gulru wants to renovate her house and improve her family's living conditions. She does not have enough funds for the renovation, so she has applied for a loan to purchase building materials. Gulru is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase building materials

loans.name: Mosoq Paqariy Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ PAQARIY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Quellouno, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Elisa es una socia muy trabajadora ella se dedica a su negocio dé restaurante por ello, trabaja todo el día, así quiere salir adelante con su familia.
La socia tiene 41 años y sigue adelante con sus esperanzas de seguir ampliando su negocio.
La socia solicito el préstamo para comprar arroz, papa y carne.

Los demás socios se dedican a brindar servicio en entidades públicas, al Agricultura entre otras actividades.
La persona que está en la foto grupal con el rostro tapado no pertenece al grupo.

Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to Mosoq Paqariy Communal Bank, located in the district of Quellouno in the province of La Convención, department of Cusco.

Elisa, 41, is a very hardworking member. She earns a living in her restaurant business, so she works all day. She wants to get ahead with her family. She hopes to continue to expand her business.

The member requested the loan to buy rice, potatoes, and meat.

The other members work in public service and in agriculture, among other jobs. They're grateful for the loan and promise to make their payments punctually.

The person with the covered face in the group photo is not a member.

loans.use: to buy rice, potatoes, and meat

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es: Catarina es una mujer emprendedora, tiene 30 años con una linda familia que es la razón de su esmero en el trabajo todos los días, ella cuenta que con el crédito le fue posible compras más productos para su tienda y a sus clientes pudo satisfacer mejor  pero también sus ingresos mejoraron. Ella nuevamente tiene la necesidad de un préstamo para poder comprar más productos de su tienda de abarrotes y poder abastecer mejor a sus clientes, pues en su comunidad es la única tienda por lo tanto tiene mucha demanda. Su gran sueño es empezar la construcción de su casa de block.
texts.en:
Catarina, 30, is an enterprising woman. She has a beautiful family, which is why she takes such care in her work every day.

She said the loan made it possible for her to buy more products for her store. She provided better customer service, but her income also improved.

She needs another loan to buy more products for her grocery store and better supply her customers. Her store is the only one in the community, so she has a lot of demand.

Her big dream is to start construction on her cinderblock house.

loans.use: to buy grocery products for her store

loans.name: Lucia

texts.pt:
A senhora Lucia é divorciada, mãe de 03 filhos maiores de idade. Vive com 02 sobrinhos e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem uma mercearia no mercado do bairro onde vive. Com o valor de crédito pretende comprar cebola, feijao verde, alface, cenoura, batata doce e reno, alho, pera e outros produtos para revender.
Sonha em ampliar seu negócio e  abraçar outro tipo de negócio como a venda de plantas e utensílios doméstico.
Enfrenta dificuldades financeiras e o desafio é lutar de modo a suprir as mesmas.
texts.en:
Lucia is divorced with 3 children of age. She lives with 2 nephews and she doesn't support anybody else.
She runs a grocery store in her neighborhood market. She wants to use this loan to buy onions, green beans, lettuce, carrots, sweet potatoes, garlic, pears and other products to resell.
Her dream is to expand her business and branch out to a different area such as selling plants and kitchen supplies.
She struggles financially but she is fighter that works to overcome her difficulties.

loans.use: to buy onions, green beans, lettuce, carrots, sweet potatoes, garlic, pears and other products to resell

loans.name: Gloria Angelica

texts.es: Gloria tiene 61 años de edad y vive en casa de su propiedad en la zona rural de su municipio, ella vive junto a su compañero de vida desde hace 40 años en su vivienda. Gloria se dedica a la venta de medicina de forma ambulante recorriendo las principales calles de su municipio para ello. La vivienda en la que habita Gloria, es muy humilde, y esta construida en un terreno desnivelado, por lo que ella desea construir un muro de retención que le brinde protección por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, piedra y mano de obra para construir un muro de retención en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Gloria is aged 61, and lives in her own home in the rural part of her municipality. She lives with her life partner of 40 years.

Gloria sells medicine as a street vendor, travelling through the main streets of the municipality to do so.

Gloria's home is very modest, and is constructed on uneven ground, so she wishes to construct a retaining wall which will provide protection. This is why she is requesting a loan through FUSAI, to buy, cement, sand, gravel, stone and manual labor to build a retaining wall in her home.

loans.use: to buy, cement, sand, gravel, stone and manual labor to build a retaining wall in her home.

loans.name: Fayzigul

texts.ru: Файзигул живет вместе с детьми на районе Джоми. Файзигул с детства работала на земле. Она с родителями работала на грядке, когда была маленькой и по сей день продолжает свою работу. У Файзигул трое детей, нет мужа растет их она одна. Сейчас один из сыновей учится в Университете. Файзигул очень гордится им. Но так как его обучение является платной, Файзигул собирает деньги на обучения сына. Сейчас нужно внести оплату на еще один год обучения. Это и является причиной обращения Файзигул за кредитом.
texts.en: Fayzigul lives with her children in the Jomi region. Fayzigul has worked the land since she was a child. She worked in the vegetable patch with her parents when she was little and is still farming to this day. Fayzigul has three children and is raising them on her own without a husband. Now one of her sons is going to university. Fayzigul is very proud of him. To pay for his studies Fayzigul has been saving up some money. Now tuition for another year of school is due, and Fayzigul is applying for a loan to pay it.

loans.use: to pay for her son's education

loans.name: Mathew

texts.en:
Mathew is maize farmer from Bazai village. As a member of Babban Gona, Mathew is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer. With Babban Gona’s support he has the chance to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of land, 5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria.

Before joining Babban Gona, Mathew would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing.

With Babban Gona’s support, Mathew can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Mathew is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family and in the end hopes to use his increased earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Joshua has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Joshua would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing.

Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Joshua can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Joshua will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Joshua is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Marie Jacqueline

texts.fr:
Marie Jacqueline vous remercie beaucoup pour le crédit. Ceci lui a permis d'acheter des œufs et des volailles supplémentaires, renforcer son fonds de roulement. Depuis, l'approvisionnement est effectué une seule fois par semaine. 
En ce moment, elle a besoin de s’approvisionner en gros, car la période des fêtes est proche (noël et fin d'année). En plus, Marie jacqueline s’est trouvée un gros client, un grand Hôtel, et ce sont les produits qui ne suffisent pas à la commande maintenant. D'où la raison du renouvellement de demande de crédit. Et elle espère encore votre coup de pouce si c'est encore possible.
texts.en: Marie Jacqueline is very thankful to you for this loan, which has enabled her to buy eggs and more chickens, as well as to boost her working capital.  She has stocked up just once a week since, but at the moment she needs to buy stock in bulk because the holiday season (Christmas and New Year) is approaching. Furthermore, Marie Jacqueline has found herself an important customer, a large hotel, and does not have the adequate products for this order. This is the reason she is asking for a renewal of her loan, and she hopes that once again you will be able to give a little help.

loans.use: to buy eggs and poultry.

loans.name: Raharimanana

texts.fr:
Raharimanana est une femme veuve de 55 ans. Elle est mère de 6 enfants dont 2 de ses enfants qui vivent avec elle l’aident dans son activité. Raharimanana et ses deux enfants travaillent en harmonie, car ils n’ont que cette activité comme gagne-pain. 
Raharimanana est dans la vente de friperie. Elle a 15 ans d’expérience dans ce domaine. C’est une activité familiale car tous les membres de sa grande famille y sont : Gendre, frères, sœurs. Elle a un grand stand de vente, ce qui s’associe avec la prospérité de la vente.
Elle a pour objectif, l’amélioration de son domicile ainsi que l’octroi de fonds pour ses deux enfants afin qu’ils deviennent indépendants financièrement.
texts.en: Raharimanana is a 55-year old widow. She is mother to six children, two of whom who live with her and help her with her business. Rhaharimanana and her two children work in harmony as this is their only breadwinning activity. Raharimanana sells second-hand clothing and has 15 years' experience in this field. It is a family business as all members of her large family are involved: her son-in-law, brothers, sisters. She has a large stall, to which the abundance of her sales can be linked. Her aim is to improve her home as well as to give money to her two children, so they can become financially independent.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of nightdresses, a bundle of macs and two bundles of baby blankets.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
A senhora Rosa tem 37 anos de idade, solteira e mae de tres filhos dos quais um frequenta o ensino primário e os dois estão no ensino secundário. Para além de filhos, sustenta ainda a sua mãe e tres sobrinhos cujos pais faleceram.
Tem uma mercearia no quintal da sua residencia e com este empréstimo vai reforçar seu negócio comprando feijao e amendoim em sacos, bebidas, fraldas descartáveis, folha de chá, açúcar, leite, farinha de milho e de trigo, arroz, sabao, peixe e outros produtos da 1a necessidade para revender.
Sonha em construir uma mercearia de alvenaria, visto que a que tem é de material local e concluir a sua casa para acomodar a familia.
As  dificuldades que enfrenta sao financeiras, porém, o desafio é trabalhar por forma a reembolar o empréstimo.
texts.en:
Rosa is 37 years old. She is a single mother of three children, one of them goes to primary school and the other two go to secondary school. Besides her children, she supports her mother and three nephews whose parents passed away.
She runs a grocery store out of a room in her home. She will restock her business with this loan by buying bags of beans and peanuts, drinks, disposable diapers, loose tea, sugar, milk, corn and wheat flour, rice, soap, fish and other basic products to resell.
Her dream is to build a masonry store, as she built the store that she owns using local materials and she would like finish building her house to better accommodate her family.
She struggles financially, but she works hard to repay her loans.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans and peanuts, drinks, disposable diapers, loose tea, sugar, milk, corn and wheat flour, rice, soap, fish and other products

loans.name: Nazirkhuja

texts.ru: Назирхуча 54 летний мужчина в самом рассвете сил. Он с семьей живет на районе Шахритус. Назирхуча решил открыть собственный продуктовый магазин. Он нашел помещение и поставил полки и закончились деньги. Ему не хватило денег для закупа продуктов. Назирхуча хоть и не опытен в этой сфере, но его тяга к улучшению своей жизни и жизни своих детей дают надежду на лучшее. Он берет кредит, чтобы закупить продукты питания,  в том числе муку, соль, макароны, подсолнечное масло, пельмени, детские смеси, шоколад, конфеты, сгущенное молоко, пряники, салфетки и многое другое. Вы можете помочь ему в начинаниях!
texts.en: Nazirkhuja is a 54 year old man in the prime of his life. He lives with his family in Shahrituz. Nazirkhuja has decided to open his own grocery store. He found a location and set up shelves but has run out of money. He does not have enough funds to stock his shelves. Nazirkhuja doesn't have much experience in this sphere, but his desire to improve his and his family's life gives him hope that he will achieve his goals. He has applied for a loan to purchase foodstuffs such as flour, salt, pasta, sunflower oil, pelmeni (dumplings), infant formula, chocolate, candies, condensed milk, traditional gingerbreads, tissues, etc. You can help him in his endeavors!

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs and open a grocery store

loans.name: Lorenett

texts.en:
Lornett hails from the town of Dumanjug. She is a 25-year-old woman and has one young dependent. She earns a living by raising and selling hogs. She sells to the local market and to town settlers in her area. Her partner in life works in construction to meet the family's daily needs.

Lotnett plans to have her house repaired to provide safety and comfort to her family. However, unfortunately, she has financial setbacks that could delay the development of the project.

She would like to boost her earnings by raising more quality hogs, which requires having a sufficient supply of feeds to become sustainable.

Lornett wants to purchase piglets and feed and materials for house repair, like plywood, nails and galvanized iron. These are essential tools that will have a big chance to help improve her livelihood. Thus her income will go higher and provide her family with proper nutrition.

She is looking forward to having a stable source of income in the future and extends thanks for the support.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed and also materials for house repair.

loans.name: Amna

texts.en:
Amna is age 39 and a mother of four children, living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. She engages in embroidery to earn an income. She started her embroidery business 7 years ago because she wanted to help her husband support the family and to meet the household expenses.

Amna buys materials such as hand-embroidery kits, ribbon, needles and other embroidery supplies from the market. Another person handles her transactions with her customers.

She has decided that she would like to sell her embroidery items directly in the market, so that she can earn a better profit for her family. She has become an expert in the embroidery business.

She requested a loan so she will be able to buy more raw materials from the market. Amna and her family will be thankful to the KIVA, lenders and to the field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for embroidery.

loans.name: Hilda Azucena

texts.es:
La Sra. Hilda  tiene 45 años de edad vive con sus 3 hijos y conviviente, en la provincia de los Rios en el Canton Ventanas.

la Sra. se dedica a la agricultura simbra y cosecha de maiz, manifiesta que el credito que esta solicitando va a invertir en la compra de Insumos.

Para su futuro piensa comprar un vehiculo.

El tiempo libre se dedica a realizar deporte.
texts.en:
Hilda is 45 years old and lives with her 3 children and partner in the Los Ríos Province in the Ventanas Canton. She works in agriculture, planting and harvesting corn. She states that the loan that she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of supplies.

For her future, she plans to buy a vehicle. In her free time, she does sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Haseena Kanwal

texts.en:
Haseena is the age of 43 and a mother of two children living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. Her husband is responsible to fulfil the needs of the entire family.

Haseena owns a bangles shop. She started running the bangles shop ten years ago to meet the family’s expenses. Her bangles shop is very famous in the colony and that is the reason her business runs well. Due to good relations, her sales have increased a lot.

Nowadays Haseena wants to invest in the bangles shop for proper income, but due to insufficient financial means she is unable to purchase more bangles. Therefore Haseena has applied for a KIVA loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, Haseena can purchase more items of bangles to earn a proper income.

Haseena and her family will be thankful to the KIVA, lenders and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy bangles  for her shop

loans.name: Yolande Razanakolona

texts.fr:
Yolande est une femme travailleuse de 44 ans. Ses enfants ont déjà tous quitté le nid familial. Yolande est dans le commerce dans un magasin générale. Elle a 7 ans d’expérience dans cette activité en plus elle n’a pas de concurrent importants. Le prêt servira à ravitailler son commerce en divers articles pour la revente : du riz, du sucre, de l’huile, des haricots ainsi que des pâtes alimentaire.
Elle exerce aussi une activité d'élevage porcin et a pour objectif d’étendre cette activité, ainsi que d’améliorer sa maison de campagne. Elle se consacre entièrement dans son travail pour pouvoir atteindre ses objectifs.
texts.en: Yolande is a hardworking 44-year-old woman. All her children have already flown the family nest. She has a grocery business and has seven years' experience in this field, without any significant competition. The loan will be used to stock up her business with a variety of products for resale: rice, sugar, oil, beans and pasta. Yolande also has an pig-raising activity and her goal is to expand this so that she can improve her house in the countryside. She is totally devoted to her work so that she can achieve her objectives.

loans.use: to buy ten sacks of rice, two sacks of sugar, two containers of oil, a sack of dried beans and three cartons of pasta.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
A senhora Ana, comerciante de 47 anos de idade, casada e mãe de 06 filhos dos quais 01 a frequentar o ensino primário, 03 a frequentar o ensino secundário 02 a frequentar o ensino superior, vive na casa própria, e sustenta a sua sogra.
Com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar, Amendoim, Capulanas, cervejas e refrigerantes para reforçar o seu negócio. 
 
O seu sonho e ver o seu negocio a crescer, concluir a sua casa, fazer o muro de vedação.
O seu maior desafio é lutar contra a pobreza e doenças, tem insuficiência de fundos, mas esta trabalhando para superar, com o crédito anterior comprou congelador e reforçou o seu negócio.
texts.en:
Ana is a 47-year-old business woman. She is married with 6 children, 1 of them in secondary school, 3 of them in primary school and 2 of them are pursuing higher education. She lives in a house that she owns and she supports a sister-in-law.
She will use this loan to buy peanuts, capulanas, beer, snacks to reinforce her business.
Her dream is to grow her business, finish her home and build a wall around it.
Her biggest challenges are to fight poverty and disease. She is lacking funds, but she works hard to get ahead. She used her previous loan to buy a fridge and stock her business.

loans.use: to buy peanuts, capulanas, beer, snacks to reinforce her business.

loans.name: Muhamadsidik

texts.ru: Мухамадсидик отец троих детей. Старший сын замужем и имеет детей. Он занимается перевозом товаров, путем грузовой автомашин. Младший сын занимается торговлей деятельностью вместе с Мухамадсидик. Младший сын школьник. Он давно не ходил в школу, по причине, что он сейчас болеет. Он нуждается в лечение. Мухамадсидик больше денег тракт на младшего сына, чтобы вылечить его. Он всегда старается и помогает детям. Мухамадсидик 5 лет занимается продажи. Он продает продукт питания. Мухамадсидик просит кредит для купли лекарство и медицинские расходы. Он делает  все ради сына. Махмадсидик обратился к Вам, потому что он верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Muhamadsidik is the father of three children. His oldest son is married with children. He works as a trucker, transporting goods. His middle son works in commerce with Muhamadsidik. His youngest son is in school. He has not been able to attend school for a long time because he is ill. He needs medical treatment. Muhamadsidik has spent a lot of money to cure his son. He always tries to help his children. Muhamadsidik has worked in sales for the last 5 years. He sells food products. He has applied for a loan to purchase medication and get medical treatment. He does everything for his son. Muhamadsidik has turned to you because he believes in you and your support.

loans.use: to get medical treatment for his youngest son.

loans.name: Stela

texts.pt:
A senhora Stela tem 31 anos de idade, solteira é órfa de pais. Vive com o seu irmão mais velho. Concluiu o nivel médio há dois anos e devido a dificuldades financeiras não conseguiu prosseguir com os estudos.
Tem uma cervejaria e talho na zona onde reside e com o empréstimo vai comprar cervejas de diversas marcas, água mineral, refrescos, carne de porco, carne de vaca, vorse e diversos para revender.
Sonha em ampliar o negócio e contratar uma servente e cozinheira.
Enfrenta dificuldades financeiras, e a falta de produtos para sua actividade e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Stela is 31 years old. She is single and she lost her parents. She lives with her oldest brother. She finished middle school two years ago, but due to financial struggles, she hasn't been able to continue her education.
She owns a butcher's and liquor store in the area where she lives and she will use this loan to buy different brands of beer, bottled water, sodas, pork, beef and other products to resell.
Her dream is to expand her business and hire a helper and a cook.
She struggles financially, and she is lacking some products needed in her line of work, but she is determined to ask for more loans and overcome her difficulties to reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy different brands of beer, bottled water, sodas, pork, beef and other products to resell

loans.name: Rabia

texts.en:
Rabia is 24 years old and living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. She engages in embroidery to earn an income. She started her embroidery business 7 years ago because she wanted to help her husband support the family to meet household expenses.

Rabia buys materials such as hand-embroidery kits, ribbon, needles and other embroidery supplies from the market. Another person handles her transactions with her customers.

Rabia has decided that she would like to sell her embroidery items directly in the market, so that she can earn better profit for her family. She has become an expert in the embroidery business.

She requested a loan so she will be able to buy raw materials from the market. Rabia and her family will be thankful to the KIVA lenders and to the field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy embroidery raw materials for herself.

loans.name: Erwin Orlando

texts.es:
El Sr. Erwin tiene 35 años de edad es soltero vive y trabaja en la Provincia de los Rios en el Canton Ventanas
Se dedica a la agricultura Siembra y cosecha de Maiz, el Sr. comenta que el credito que solicita va hacer invertido para la compra de insumos para la agricultura.

El tiempo libre realiza deportes.
texts.en:
Erwin is 35 years old. He is single and lives and works in the Los Ríos Province in the Ventanas Canton. He makes a living in agriculture, planting and harvesting corn. He says the loan that he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of agricultural inputs.

In his free time, he does sports.

loans.use: in the purchase of agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Shaila

texts.en:
Shaila is the age of 34 and a mother of four children living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. Her husband is responsible to fulfil the needs of the entire family.

Shaila owns a bangles shop. She started running the bangles shop three years ago to meet the family’s expenses. Her bangles shop is very famous in the colony, and that is the reason her business runs well. Due to good relations, her sales have increased a lot.

Nowadays, Shaila wants to invest in the bangles shop for proper income, but due to insufficient financial means she is unable to purchase more bangles. Therefore Shaila has applied for a KIVA loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan Shaila can purchase more bangles to earn a proper income.

Shaila and her family will be thankful to KIVA, lenders and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy bangles  for her shop

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma is the age of 26 and a mother of two children she is living with her spouse and children in the area of Multan, Pakistan. She engages in embroidery to earn an income. She started her embroidery business six years ago because she wanted to help her husband support the family and meet the household expenses.

Asma buys materials such as a hand embroidery kit, ribbons, needles and an embroidery machine from the market. Another person handles her transactions with her customers.

She has decided that she would like to sell her embroidery items directly in the market so that she can earn a better profit for her family. She has become an expert in the embroidery business.

So Asma requested a loan to buy raw materials from the market.

Asma and her family will be thankful to KIVA, lenders and field partner BRAC Pakistan for helping them by funding this loan to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy embroidery raw material for herself.

loans.name: Gangaben And Group

texts.en:
Gangaben is 39 years old and hails from the Dahod district of Gujarat. She is married and blessed with four children: three sons and a daughter. All them are attending local school in different grades.

She runs an utensil business in her location to earn an income. The income she gets from the utensil business is used in meeting the household expenses. Her household monthly income is only Rs.17,000, which makes it difficult to pay for her children’s education fees.

She wishes to expand her utensil business by purchasing more items to sell so that she can increase her income and earn a sufficient amount of money for the household. With the help of Prayas (Milaap’s field partner in Gujarat) she formed a group called Gangaben and Group. The group consist four members who together need loans for their respective business.

Gangaben plans to purchase plates, bowls, spoons and glasses for her utensil business, along with other necessary things.

With your help, these women will be able to sustain and expand their business. Their respective business profits will definitely help them sustain their family's daily needs, their children's education expenses and any emergencies that may arise. They are grateful to their lenders.

loans.use: To purchase materials for her utensil business

loans.name: Jean Fidélice

texts.fr:
